examples.title: Counter
examples.description: A basic counter example demonstrating state management with increment, decrement, and reset actions.

value.value: A simple counter with increment, decrement, and reset.

examples.title: Router
examples.description: A multi-page routing example demonstrating navigation, nested routes, and dynamic parameters.
examples.note: This example requires the @constela/router package and uses TypeScript instead of the JSON DSL for router configuration.

examples.title: Portals, Timers, Observers & Validity
examples.description: Demo of Portals, Timers (auto-close modal), Intersection Observer, and Form Validity.

value.value: Demonstrating Portals, Observers, and Form Validity.
Render content outside the component tree. Modal auto-closes in 3 seconds.

style.value: padding: 8px 16px; background: #0070f3; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px;

then.value: margin-bottom: 24px; padding: 16px; background: #e0f2fe; border-radius: 8px; transition: all 0.5s; transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1;

else.value: margin-bottom: 24px; padding: 16px; background: #f5f5f5; border-radius: 8px; transition: all 0.5s; transform: translateY(20px); opacity: 0.5;

value.value: This section uses Intersection Observer. Status:
